translation: thousand bowls of Mañjuśrī's one hundred and eight names are praised

source_sentence: 本(云)　般若寺僧正觀賢御本ヲ以テ交之朗澄明應六年(丁巳)五月十九日善忍律師染筆
translation: Formerly, on the 19th day of the fifth month in the sixth year (dingshi) of the reign of Samantabhadra at Prajñā Monastery, Sengzheng Guangxian Goben and Wang Chengming Ying
